snippet: The company, known for its small-scale artisans and handmade goods, will help some sellers get bigger, and take a commission.
abstract: Etsy, popular e-commerce site for handmade, vintage and other artisan items, is offering its sellers an opportunity to build their business by selling to retailers through company's new wholesale website; will take 3.5 percent commission on each wholesale transaction.
lead_paragraph: The company, known for its small-scale artisans and handmade goods, will help some sellers get bigger, and take a commission.

headline.main: Etsy, Home of the Handmade, Takes On a Wholesaler’s Role
headline.print_headline: Etsy, Home of the Handmade, Takes On a Wholesaler’s Role
